sentences.en: For instance, humans are endotherms and maintain an internal temperature of 37℃, no matter whether the environment is warm or cold.
sentences.cn: 比如，人是恒温动物，无论环境温度是怎样，体温都维持在37℃。

sentences.en: Many scientists have problems with the arguments you read in the passage. They don't think those arguments prove that dinosaurs were endotherms.
sentences.cn: 很多科学家对你们刚刚听到的文章持有不同意见。他么认为这些理由不能支持恐龙是恒温动物。

trans.tran_cn: 温血动物, 恒温动物
